arg.name: install_request
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (InstallRequest, platform2/system_api/dbus/dlcservice/dlcservice.proto) of arguments that can toggle how DLC are installed.

method.name: Purge
method.tp:docstring: Removes a DLC and all files related to it.

method.name: Deploy
method.tp:docstring: Create DLC slots and load deployed DLC image into the slots.

method.name: GetInstalled
method.tp:docstring: Returns a list of installed Downloadable Content (DLC) IDs that are installed.

arg.name: ids
arg.tp:docstring: A list of DLC IDs of installed DLCs.

method.name: GetExistingDlcs
method.tp:docstring: Returns a list of DLCs that have content on disk.

arg.name: dlc_list
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (DlcsWithContent, platform2/system_api/dbus/dlcservice/dlcservice.proto) of a list of DLCs that have content on disk.

method.name: GetDlcsToUpdate
method.tp:docstring: Returns a list of DLCs that need to be updated. The implementation needs to make sure the target DLC images are ready to be updated.

arg.name: ids
arg.tp:docstring: A list of DLC IDs for DLCs that need to be updated.

method.name: GetDlcState
method.tp:docstring: Returns the state of a DLC.

arg.name: state
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (DlcState, platform2/system_api/dbus/dlcservice/dlcservice.proto) indicating the state of a DLC.

method.name: InstallCompleted
method.tp:docstring: Notifies dlcservice that the installation is complete for the given DLCs.

method.name: UpdateCompleted
method.tp:docstring: Notifies dlcservice that the update is complete for the given DLCs.

arg.name: state
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (DlcState, platform2/system_api/dbus/dlcservice/dlcservice.proto) of the current state of the DLC.
